TechStack.title: My Tech Stack
TechStack.thanks: Watching many content creators helped me advance my career and take a leap and learn some of the things above. Special thank to <prime>ThePrimeagen</prime> and <theo>Theo</theo> as these two channels helped me understand the ecosystem from completely different point of views. Give them a follow, you will not regret it!

FuturePlans.title: Future Plans
FuturePlans.p: This is to be written more about,I will talk about my future plans for my career,what languages i want to learn, which projects i need to make to move forward in the current market.
FuturePlans.p1: Do i want to get sucked in the AI hype? Do i want to get more into mobile development?(Using Expo ofc). Should i become a blazingly fast Rust developer? Or is Go the best languatge to use?
FuturePlans.p2: I definatly would want to work on more impactful things, participating in a large company's development process is something i don't think i would like, but aren't complicated and meaningful things meant to be difficult?
FuturePlans.p3: Regardless of what field or in which language it is, i believe i will make some cool things, that many people are going to use.
FuturePlans.p4: To end it with the most important thing to do.Particpate more in open-source and teaching. As i appreciate how much free-stuff there is online for me to learn from, and it is my duty to pass it down to others.

description.recipe: Recipe page for your favorite dish. Frontend design practise
description.movie: Search for the latest movies and get information about them

about.intro: I like types (no raw Javascript please). NextJs is the best way to build a modern-web app. Sveltekit is very interesting. I love TailwindCSS. By the way, did i say that i use Neovim .
